definition: to circle in the air/to soar
to soar/to glide/variant of 詳|详[xiang2]

sentences.english: To me, dreams about flying express feelings about freedom;
sentences.chinese: 就我看来，有关飞翔的梦表达了对自由的渴望。

sentences.english: He dreamed a black swan and several swallows flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他梦见一只黑天鹅和几只燕子在空中飞翔。

sentences.english: A new love puts an old one to flight.
The universe is very big, let fly, loaded with joy, return.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙很大，任飞翔，满载欢乐，回航。

sentences.english: The plane is flying high in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 飞机在高高的蓝天上飞翔。

sentences.english: Birds were singing among the trees and an eagle was flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿在林间鸣啭，一只老鹰正在空中飞翔。

sentences.english: In the blue the sky the white cloud is hovering.
sentences.chinese: 蓝蓝的天上，白云在飞翔。

sentences.english: In the dream, I had wings and flied freely.
sentences.chinese: 在那个梦境中，我有双翅膀而且能随意飞翔。

sentences.english: A fallen leaf Mourns its wings that can not fly.
sentences.chinese: 飘落的叶子遗憾自己不会飞翔的翅膀。

sentences.english: Then the gates of his heart were flung open, and his joy flew far over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他的心门砉然地开了，他的喜乐在海面飞翔。

sentences.english: They soared beautifully een as they fought the restriction of the string.
sentences.chinese: 即使与牵引线奋争着，它们依然在美丽地飞翔。

sentences.english: I learned to fly, I can hover in the sky of.
sentences.chinese: 我学会了飞翔，我能翱翔于天际了。

sentences.english: We are all one-winged angel, can fly only embracing.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是单翅的天使，只有拥抱才能飞翔。

sentences.english: There are many birds crisscrossing in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 许多鸟儿在天空中来往飞翔。

sentences.english: All of us are single-wing angel, can fly only by embracing each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是单翼的天使，只有相互拥抱时才能飞翔。

sentences.english: Soaring is just what China expects Liu to do.
sentences.chinese: 飞翔正是中国期待刘翔做到的。

definition: to soar/to wheel about in the sky
to spread one's wings and soar (idiom)/to develop one's abilities freely
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
